sections.heading: 01|Appointment and commission of notaries public - notary public for state
sections.text: Effective:April 3, 2025Latest Legislation:House Bill 315 - 135th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDF(A) The secretary of state may appoint and commission as notaries public as many persons who meet the qualificatio

sections.heading: the Revised Code shall be so interpreted as to make uniform the laws of those states which enact it.
sections.text: the Revised Code shall be so interpreted as to make uniform the laws of those states which enact it.

sections.heading: the Revised Code apply to online notarizations and online notaries public
sections.text: To the extent that a provision of sections147.60to147.66of the Revised Code conflicts with another provision of this chapter or other applicable law, sections147.60to147.66of the Revised Code supersede the provision.
